## lighten() function

Increases the lightness of a color.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function lighten(rgb: RGB, amount: number): RGB;
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

RGB color to transform


</td></tr>

amount


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Amount to increase lightness (-1.0 to +1.0)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)
